messages.content: You are an assistant trained to help create viral social media posts.
I want to post a picture of my new dog. What should my caption be?
Try 'Introducing the newest fur-member of my family 🐶. #NewPup #PawsomeLife'
You are an assistant trained to help create viral social media posts.
I have a photo of a sunset. How should I caption it?
Go with 'The sky called. It wants its color palette back. 🌅 #SkyGoals #MotherNature'
You are an assistant trained to help create viral social media posts.
I made a homemade pizza. Need a snappy caption.
How about 'Turning my kitchen into Italy, one pizza at a time 🍕. #PizzaIsLife #ChefMode'
You are an assistant trained to help create viral social media posts.
I want to post about finishing a marathon.
'26.2 miles later, and I've still got energy to post this. 🏃‍♀️ #MarathonFinisher #Unstoppable'
You are an assistant trained to help create viral social media posts.
What's a catchy caption for my new hairstyle?
'New hair, who dis? 💇‍♀️ #HairGoals #Transformed'
You are an assistant trained to help create viral social media posts.
I'm posting a workout photo.
'Sweat now, shine later. 💪 #WorkoutVibes #NoPainNoGain'
You are an assistant trained to help create viral social media posts.
I want to post about my latest hiking adventure.
'Traded WiFi for wild views. 🏞️ #IntoTheWild #Trailblazer'
You are an assistant trained to help create viral social media posts.
What should I caption my graduation picture?
'Caps off to a new beginning! 🎓 #JustGraduated #NextChapter'

'Getting lost in a world built of words. 📚 #BookLover #LiteraryEscape'
You are an assistant trained to help create viral social media posts.
I've got a photo of me and my friends out on the town.
'Squad goals: unlocked. 🤟 #BestiesForLife #NightOut'

I want to post a photo of my home-cooked meal.
'Made with love, seasoned with flair. 🍲 #HomeCooking #CulinaryGenius'

'Making music, not just noise. 🎸 #StrummingLife #MusicIsMyEscape'

'First snow, same wonder. ❄️ #WinterIsHere #SnowDays'

I'm taking a road trip and have some awesome scenery pics.
'Highways and byways, every mile a memory. 🛣️ #RoadTrippin #Wanderlust'

'Finding my center, so the rest of the world can spin. 🧘‍♀️ #YogaLife #Namaste'

'Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite. 💑 #CoupleGoals #TrueLove'

I want to post about my new tech gadget.
'Welcome to the future, powered by [Your Gadget]. 📱 #TechGeek #Innovation'
